description: The fourth entry in Mario Kart series, Double Dash shakes up the gameplay by introducing 2 drivers per vehicle.

v0.1.0.description:
# First public release of Mario Kart Double Dash Archipelago!

At this point basic functionality is included, although the process is a bit dry bones... I mean bare bones. Here's short overview of included features.

## Goals

Your goal is to obtain Gold Trophies by winning cups. Getting enough trophies opens All Cup Tour, and winning it is your end goal. There's also a setting for having the end goal be just the trophies.

## Items

Following things are unlockable:
* Characters (you begin with 2 random characters)
* Karts (you begin with one kart per weight class)
* Upgrades for karts (various stats)
* Vehicle classes and cups for grand prix
* Courses available in time trials
* Item box items, some per character, some are unlocked for everybody
* Starting items for time trials
* Cup skips (lets you start in second or third course of a cup)

## Locations

Following things give you items:
* Getting bronze, silver and gold cups and finishing a cup for the first time
  * These are per cup and per vehicle class
  * Winning at higher level nets you the low-level cups as well
* Winning, being at first place after the first lap or finishing a course for the first time
  * Finishing a course can be done in either time trial or grand prix
* Getting good time and beating staff ghost times in time trials
* Winning with a character using their default kart
* Winning with a character in their own course
* Getting gold with a light, medium and heavy carts, as well as Parade Kart

## Quality of Life / Fun Things

* Courses can be shuffled.
* You can set courses to be 2 laps long, or custom amounts for each course.
* Mirror mode can be 200cc.
* All Cup Tour length can be changed, if you don't want to go through all 16 courses to finish the game.
* Logic difficulty setting - you are guaranteed some upgrades before winning races is expected.
* Universal Tracker support.
  * Option for UT to show all technically available locations, even if logic difficulty was set to easy.
* `/unlocked` command to show all currently unlocked thingies
  * Hopefully these will be displayed in-game some day...

All in all, I find the game already quite enjoyable, and I hope you could test it too! There's still room for improvement, so if you run into any problems, consult the troubleshooting section of the [setup guide](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash/blob/987fa5be2b721edc9434b27fd2f48c33d3934424/worlds/mario_kart_double_dash/docs/setup_en.md).
v0.1.0.title: MKDD AP v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
This update aims to fix the worst problems of the first release and improve the experience. The update is backwards compatible, so even if you have a seed generated, you can use the updated client!

So grab yourself a new apworld and updated options template below and have a good one! If this is your first time playing MKDD AP, here's the [setup guide](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash/blob/a8f0e9b16c17091ca2a4c5422e02b748113236b4/worlds/mario_kart_double_dash/docs/setup_en.md) and [readme](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash/blob/a8f0e9b16c17091ca2a4c5422e02b748113236b4/README.md).

## New features

- Time trials checks can be toggled off.
- Staff ghost locations are by default disabled.

## Fixes

- Fix some characters being hard to select.
- Fix All Cup Tour being hidden.
- Automatically create less items if there's not enough locations.
- Fix generation failing if kart upgrades is set to 0.
- Fix Wario being default for player 2 even if Wario is not unlocked.
- Fix wrong weight class karts being sometimes selectable.
- Change custom laps default so that it doesn't clash with shorter courses option.
- Remove All Cup Tour locations if goal is set to trophies.
v0.1.1.title: MKDD AP v0.1.1

v0.2.0.description:
This update aims to improve the user experience by bringing more generation options and qol features! The updated version has some changes which makes it not backwards compatible, so be sure your host has the newest version when generating a seed!

So grab yourself a new apworld and updated options template (there's some renamed options, don't use your old yaml!) below and have a good one! If this is your first time playing MKDD AP, here's the [setup guide](worlds/mario_kart_double_dash/docs/en_Setup.md) and [readme](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash).

## New features
- In-game notifications for sent and received items!
- Character selection screen shows available items for selected characters.
- Character selection screen shows selected kart name and upgrades.
- New locations for winning a race with default pair of characters (for example, win with Mario and Luigi)
- Characters now have 1 item unlocked from the beginning (can be changed in options).
- Support for Universal Tracker's glitched logic feature. If you're using a recent version of UT on Archipelago 0.6.2, locations which aren't in logic but technically obtainable are shown in yellow.
- Option to disable speed upgrades, making the karts go at vanilla speed.
- Option to shuffle extra trophies into the pool.
- Option to remove trophies from winning cups.

## Fixes
- The client should now be compatible with latest Archipelago 0.6.2 rc version. (thanks to @TreZc0)
- All Cup Tour duplicate tracks.
- Some cups not being accessible before goal.
- Tracker shows trophy goal being achievable when it's not

## Changes
- Some items are renamed to be less confusing for new players:
  - `Progressive Class` -> `Progressive CC`
  - `Progressive Cup Skip` -> `Progressive GP Race Skip`
  - `Progressive Engine Upgrade` -> `Progressive Speed Upgrade`
- Option `trophy_amount` is now `trophy_requirement` to avoid confusion with extra trophies.
- Using high number of global items no more makes every character have multiple of the same item. Rather, they can have any item. There'll be overlapping with global items instead, making those items higher chance of appearing.
v0.2.0.title: MKDD AP v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description: A quick update to fix a generation problem when speed upgrades are disabled and difficulty setting is at high value.
v0.2.1.title: MKDD AP v0.2.1 (hotfix)

v0.2.2.description:
Here's a bugfix update! The update fixes several generation-related issues and it's compatible with worlds generated with v0.2.x versions. 

Download a new apworld and options template below and have a good one! If this is your first time playing MKDD AP, here's the [setup guide](worlds/mario_kart_double_dash/docs/en_Setup.md) and [readme](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash).

## Changes
- If time trials are enabled, the game starts with 1 track unlocked.
- If trophy requirement is higher than available trophies, more trophies are added in to the pool.
- Generator now outputs warnings if it changed some options automatically.

## Fixes
- Location `Win Gold With Parade Kart` now generates correctly.
- Item `Progressive Time Trial Item` now generates correctly.
- Show item synergy correctly for Wario, Waluigi, Petey and Boo.
v0.2.2.title: MKDD AP v0.2.2

v0.2.3.description:
A small compatibility update with a nice qol feature on top! This update was made mainly to add compatibility to Archipelago 0.7 and also alleviate some issues newcomers are facing. It's compatible with worlds generated with v0.2.x versions.

Download a new apworld and options template below and have a good one! If this is your first time playing MKDD AP, here's the [setup guide](docs/en_Setup.md) and [readme](https://github.com/aXu-AP/archipelago-double-dash).

## New Features
- Status bar with icons for collected trophies, characters and cups.

## Changes
- Added Archipelago 0.7 compatibility.
- More prevalent error when seed was generated on mismatching version.

## Fixes
- No more black screen from outdated UT versions
v0.2.3.title: MKDD AP v0.2.3
